rule.name: nginx_active_connection_heartbeat
rule.description: Raise an alert when status page statistics are no longer being received by ATSD. Check that the server is reachable and Axibase Collector job is running.

emailNotification.body-first: An alert when status page statistics are no longer being received by ATSD has been raised. Check that the server is reachable and Axibase Collector job is running.
emailNotification.body-cancel: Sufficient amount of statistics data about NGINX server has been received during last 3 minutes.
emailNotification.name: Email Notification id=1
emailNotification.first-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}
emailNotification.repeat-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}
emailNotification.cancel-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}

rule.name: nginx_active_connection_low
rule.description: Raise an alert when an NGINX server average Active Connection count is below 10 over the last 15 minutes.

emailNotification.body-first: An alert when an NGINX server average Active Connection count is below 10 over the last 15 minutes has been raised.
emailNotification.body-cancel: Your NGINX server Active Connection count is above 10 over the last 15 minutes. Your server is likely to have no problems with accessibility.
emailNotification.name: Email Notification id=3
emailNotification.first-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}
emailNotification.repeat-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}
emailNotification.cancel-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}

rule.name: nginx_tcp_heartbeat
rule.description: Raise an alert when TCP connect metric is no longer being received by ATSD or if tcp connect metric contains error codes. Check that the server is reachable and Axibase Collector job is running.

emailNotification.body-first: An alert when TCP connect metric is no longer being received by ATSD or if tcp connect metric contains error codes has been raised. Check that the server is reachable and Axibase Collector job is running.
emailNotification.body-cancel: Now NGINX server is responding to tcp connections as expected.

emailNotification.repeat-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}
emailNotification.cancel-subject: Rule ${rule}. Status ${status}. Entity: for ${entity}. Metric: ${metric}. Tags: ${tags}. Duration: ${alert_duration_interval}

rule.name: nginx_unhandled_percent_high
rule.description: Raise an alert when an NGINX server unhandled connection percentage is above 2%.

emailNotification.body-first: An alert when an NGINX server unhandled connection percentage is above 2% has been raised.
emailNotification.body-cancel: Now your server's unhandled connection percentage is below 2%.
